pkgmetadata.longdescription: Extract Event Statistics in Hydrologic Time Series // Events from individual hydrologic time series are extracted, and events from multiple time series can be matched to each other. Tang, W. Carey, S. K. (2017) doi:10.1002/hyp.11185. Kaur, S., Horne, A., Stewardson, M.J., Nathan, R., Costa, A.M., Szemis, J.M., Webb, J.A. (2017) doi:10.1080/24705357.2016.1276418. Ladson, A., Brown, R., Neal, B., Nathan, R. J. (2013) doi:10.7158/W12-028.2013.17.1.
